name: Dug Up Gordon
description:
How to play
  1. The "@" is Gordon
  2. "*" means you dug up the seeds.
  3. "." means the seeds you didn't dug up
  4. "#" means that is an obstacle don't hit it!
  5. The "|" and "-" are the walls don't hit it
  6. "X" is your VAN and that will finish the game

Once you gather all of the seeds go to the "X" marker.

DONE!

Sorry if you get disgusted on this game it is because i'm still new to developing games and this is my stepping stone on what I want to become.
